message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product at a competitive price of $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me in the middle at $12,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more than that to me.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $16,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $12,000, which is the price I can get from another seller. Can you meet me at that price?
